game.name: Don't Peek Out
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An asymmetrical survival game where strategy, and trust collide. Players navigate a mazed house, gather objects and seal ancient runes before dawn breaks. Something hunts them in the dark and it won’t stop until every player is caught. Will you outsmart the monster, or embrace the shadows as one?
game.shortDescriptionEn: An asymmetrical survival game where strategy, and trust collide. Players navigate a mazed house, gather objects and seal ancient runes before dawn breaks. Something hunts them in the dark and it won’t stop until every player is caught. Will you outsmart the monster, or embrace the shadows as one?
